ygData.subject: Re: Unfair advantage...
ygData.msgSnippet: Glad to know that you are still with us JM :)  You re insights concerning the internals of the game and tips for bards everywhere have been invaluable to say
ygData.messageBody:
Glad to know that you are still with us JM :) You're insights concerning the
internals of the game and tips for bards everywhere have been invaluable to
say the least. Just a heartfelt thank you for taking time out of your
schedule to interact with us here at EQBards.
Penaden Songweaver
Vizier of Akalabeth
The Lost Order of Akalabeth
http://www.lostorder.com


"J.M. Capozzi" wrote:

> From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
> I suggested Chant as it includes everyone who has Selo's, not just those
> 7th level and above. Once you get Warsong and Anthem, you have more
> options.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 4:40 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...
>
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > I was probably trying to juggle Selos and Anthem - if you have Anthem is
> it
> > still worth keeping Chant loaded? Or do you reload for the running?
> >
> > Sylly.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 2:34 PM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...
> >
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> > No doubt JM, do it all the time. It really helps when
> > making a fur run and
> > you're at 103/75!
> >
> > Kitasi of E'ci
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 1:12 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unfair advantage...
> >
> >
> > From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
> >
> > Just a hint...you can juggle Selos and Chant of Battle quite
> > nicely, if
> > you're running heavy.
> >
> >
